bio:
I have extensive knowledge and hands-on project experience in web development. My expertise includes React, TypeScript, Material UI, Sass, UI/UX design, and RESTful API design.
I have a proven track record of delivering scalable, user-focused web applications and collaborating effectively within cross-functional teams. Additionally, I stay updated with the latest industry trends and best practices, ensuring innovative and efficient solutions in all my projects.

skills.title: UI/UX Design
skills.content: I am proficient in using Adobe Illustrator, Photoshop, and XD to design elegant, and Adobe After Effects for complex visiual effects.

skills.title: Web Development
skills.content: I am an experienced software engineer with a strong focus on distributed systems and building scalable backend services.

skills.title: Mobile Development
skills.content: I have knowledge of SwiftUI and React Native for mobile development, enabling me to design and build intuitive, responsive, and visually appealing iOS applications.

experiences.title: Software Development Engineer I
experiences.description: Built large scale project with serverless compuation, collaborate with other teams to produce high quality code.

experiences.title: Computer System Technology Diploma
experiences.description: Created multiple web porjects with peers by using html, css, and javascript. Proficient programming with C and Java.

experiences.title: Bachelor of Arts in Economics
experiences.description: Achieved 3 times Dean's Honor Roll with excellent academic records. Enhanced my critical thinking by taking advance Economics courses.
